mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (message_chatroomid, message_ctnt, message_date, message_sendto, message_from) VALUES (#{message_chatroomid}, #{message_ctnt}, #{message_date}, #{message_sendto}, #{message_from})
INSERT INTO alarm (alarm_category, alarm_sendto, alarm_from, alarm_valuepk) VALUES (#{alarm_category}, #{alarm_sendto}, #{alarm_from}, #{alarm_valuepk})
